_header: Mary full of grace well thee be
_description: The Angelic Salutation — four monorhyming lines

BLAru292.Transcription:
Marie ful off grace ƿeel ðe beGodd of heuen be
                    ƿið ðeOure all ƿimmen bliscedd tu beSo be ðe
                    bern ðatt is boren of ðe
